name: Serenity Kids 6+ Months Baby Puffs - Pack of 6, 1.5 oz, Variety Pack- USDA Organic Grain Free Toddler Food - Nut, Rice & Gluten Free Baby Snacks with Veggies, Legumes & Olive Oil
short_description: Snack Time Revolution: Dive into snack time with Serenity Kids Grain-Free Baby Puffs, the ultimate puffs baby snack for 6-month-olds and up. Packed with organic veggies and chickpea, these puffs are perfect for developing little palates without added sugar

Flavorful Fun: Let your kiddo indulge in delicious organic baby puffs loaded with flavors like pumpkin and carrot. These toddler puffs are a fun way to introduce exciting flavors and are a hit with little foodies

On-the-Go Ease: Tackle busy days or chill moments at home with these puffs for babies 6-12 months that come in a no-mess canister. They're the ultimate portable baby food essential when snack attacks strike

Clean Ingredients: Trust Serenity Kids for organic puffs for babies made from gluten-free, clean ingredients. These grain-free puffs are a wholesome choice for parents who want nothing but the best for their little ones

Tiny Foodie Adventure: Encourage your little one to explore new flavors with these dissolvable baby snacks. Perfectly sized for tiny hands and curious taste buds, these organic baby food puffs make eating fun and adventurous
product_description: Serenity Kids Grain-Free Baby Puffs are here to shake up snack time for your little munchkin. These puffs are perfect for kids starting at 6 months old and are a great choice for those chill winter days and early spring afternoons when you're out and about with your tiny tot. Packed with chickpea and navy bean flour along with a pop of veggies, they're made to delight your little one's taste buds while keeping things healthy and gluten-free. These baby puffs snacks come in a variety of flavors like carrot, pumpkin, and cheesy spinach cauliflower, making sure snack time never gets boring. Designed for tiny hands, these baby finger foods are not just easy to hold; they dissolve easily, making them a safe choice for your baby to munch on. And with no added sugar, you can feel confident knowing they're developing their palate, not their sweet tooth. Perfect for parents on the go, these organic baby snacks come in no-mess canisters that fit right into your diaper bag, making them an ideal choice for on-the-go snacking. Whether you're hanging out at home or exploring the great outdoors, these puffs for toddlers are ready to jump into action. Each pack comes with six 1.5-ounce canisters, ensuring you have plenty for those unexpected snack attacks. USDA Organic and grain-free, these puffs are made with clean ingredients you can trust. With Serenity Kids Grain-Free Baby Puffs, you're not just feeding your child; you're fueling their future and nurturing their foodie spirit.

name: Little Bellies Organic Apple & Berry Softcorn Baby Snack (Pack of 18 x 0.28 oz Individual Packs)
short_description: Fabulously fruity, these bite-size clouds of puffed organic corn sprinkled with apple and berry melt in the mouth to encourage safe self–feeding.
Suitable for children from 10 months of age. Ideal for second stage snacking.
USDA Certified Organic — Our organic ingredients, recipes and suppliers have been specially screened and selected to ensure they are appropriate and safe for growing little bellies.

Not sweetened or salted — We don’t use cane sugar or add simple sugars such as rice syrup, honey, or maltodextrin to our baby snacks for 7+ months & 10+ months old babies. We only use dried organic fruit & vegetable powders for a subtle hint of sweetness.

Always natural and wholesome — We only use natural food ingredients that you can recognize such as fruit and vegetable powders, lentils and grains. All our products are non-GMO, free from artificial colors, flavors or additives.
Age and stage appropriate — We carefully consider nutritional requirements, flavors, shapes and textures for every age and stage to support independent self-feeding and aid motor skill progression.
Do What’s Natural — We believe nurturing comes naturally, so we provide simple, wholesome age-and-stage appropriate foods that help parents raise independent and unique little people.
product_description: Fabulously fruity, these soft puffed corn snacks sprinkled with apple and berry melt in the mouth to encourage safe self–feeding. Our MORE TO EXPLORE puffed snacks for babies from 10+ months bring new adventures in taste, shape, and textures to help promote independence.
